titleInfo.title: WNOX news report -- Art Linkletter's House Party (opening)

mods.abstract: WNOX news broadcast with commercials. End of disc contains the beginning of Art Linkletter's House Party, with guest Pierre J. Huss (chief of the Hearst Headline Service Bureau at the United Nations). Circa March 1962.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
